attributes.action: Help Coventry city fc fans force sisu to sell the club
attributes.additional_details:
Reasons for petition for sisu to sell 

1-lie to fans on reinvestment of player sales 
2-on the verge of losing a great English football academy wich has already produced England players and future England players
3-moved the club to another city because sisu didn't want to pay rent and this could happen yet again
4-no communication with fans 
5-since sisu have owned Ccfc the fans are more divided than ever before
6-sisu continue to try take legal actions after losing in court on numerous occasions 
7-Handling of club matters encourage bad feeling and explosive temperament
8-Dwindling crowds getting lower because of lack of direction and confidence in owners
attributes.background:
Year after year 
Season after season 
Coventry city football fans are promised things and these promises are broken everytime 
All football fans love or hate Ccfc just imagine if this was your team your passion your love 
Help the hole of football get rid of the rubbish fans put up with

rejection.details:
The actions of Sisu, including its continued ownership of Coventry City Football Club, are a matter for its board of directors, and the Government and/or Parliament are not responsible for the actions of the company.

If you had a more general concern about the owners of football clubs being required to take the views of fans and fan representatives into account, you could start a petition about that.
